column1: Table 6. Out-of-state arrests of prisoners released in 30 states in 2005
Report title: Recidivism of Prisoners Released in 30 States in 2005: Patterns from 2005 to 2010
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2005 data collection
Authors: Matthew R. Durose, Alexia D. Cooper, Ph.D., and Howard N. Snyder, Ph.D
Table 6. Out-of-state arrests of prisoners released in 30 states in 2005

Note: Prisoners were tracked for 5 years following release. Arrested out-of-state includes arrests that occurred in states other than the one that released the prisoner in 2005. See appendix table 6 for standard errors.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2005 data collection.
